CHAT.comment: Looking at books the children choose , telling stories , looking at a photo album which shows pictures of the children and their families , playing with a puppet and a card game.
This file is the sixth of a series of eight (13a to 13h) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: the children were waiting for me to change the cassette .
Lucille is not in front of the camera .
Kelsang , Dylan , and Lucille are pushing one another in front of the camera .
Dylan is throwing the soft toys on the beds .
showing one of the soft toys to Dylan .
taking the puppet from Lucille's hands .
Massimo and Lucille are now sitting around the table .
Kelsang is sitting in front of the camera .
looking at the photo album with Massimo .
Dylan is playing with the puppet .
Dylan wants to put the puppet to bed ?
still looking at the photo album with Lucille .
Dylan and Kelsang run around the table .
handing the puppet to Kelsang who is back in front of the camera .
Massimo wants to go back into the classroom .
talking about himself . Dylan can't see himself in the control screen .
Dylan can see Massimo in the control screen .
